languages.text: "Вы весьма прозорливы, {name}. Подобные вещи, попав в руки смертных, нередко делают их своими рабами. Я рад, что вы избежали этой участи".

traits.locale_text: "Вы весьма прозорливы, {name}. Должен отметить, подобные вещи, попав в руки смертных, нередко делают их своими рабами. Я рад, что вы избежали этой участи".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."
languages.original_text: "Вы весьма прозорливы, {name}. Подобные вещи, попав в руки смертных, нередко делают их своими рабами. Я рад, что вы избежали этой участи".

traits.locale_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你很有洞见，{name}。若是凡人得到了这样的造物，他们往往会沦为它的奴隶。我很高兴你避开了这样的命运。”
languages.original_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."

traits.locale_text: “你很有洞见，{name}。若是凡人得到了这样的造物，他们往往会沦为它的奴隶。我很高兴你避开了这样的命运。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Muy perspicaz, {name}. En manos de mortales, esta clase de objetos tiende a esclavizar a quien los sujeta. Me alegro de que haya podido evitar ese destino».
languages.original_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."

traits.locale_text: «Muy perspicaz, {name}. En manos de mortales, esta clase de objetos tiende a esclavizar a quien los sujeta. Me alegro de que haya podido evitar ese destino».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「なかなか鋭いな、{name}さん。人間の手にかかると、このようなものはしばしば、それを持つ者を道具の奴隷としてしまう。我は、あなたがそのような運命を避けられたことを嬉しく思う」
languages.original_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."

traits.locale_text: 「なかなか鋭いな、{name}さん。人間の手にかかると、このようなものはしばしば、それを持つ者を道具の奴隷としてしまう。我は、あなたがそのような運命を避けられたことを嬉しく思う」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Et c'est on ne peut plus normal, {name}. Les objets de ce genre, laissés entre les mains de simples mortels, ont tôt fait de transformer leurs maîtres en esclaves. Je me réjouis que vous ayez eu la sagesse de prendre la bonne décision avant qu'il ne soit trop tard. »
languages.original_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."

traits.locale_text: « Et c'est on ne peut plus normal, {name}. Les objets de ce genre, laissés entre les mains de simples mortels, ont tôt fait de transformer leurs maîtres en esclaves. Je me réjouis que vous ayez eu la sagesse de prendre la bonne décision avant qu'il ne soit trop tard. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sehr einsichtig, {name}. Wenn Sterbliche solche Objekte in den Händen halten, werden sie oft zu deren Sklaven. Es freut mich, dass Euch dieses Schicksal nicht ereilt hat."
languages.original_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."

traits.locale_text: "Sehr einsichtig, {name}. Wenn Sterbliche solche Objekte in den Händen halten, werden sie oft zu deren Sklaven. Es freut mich, dass Euch dieses Schicksal nicht ereilt hat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Very insightful, . In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."

languages.text: "Algıların oldukça güçlü {name}. Böylesi nesneler, fânilerin ellerine geçtiğinde sıklıkla ona hükmettiğini sanan insanları kölesi kılar. Böylesi bir kaderden sakınman, beni memnun etti."
languages.original_text: "Very insightful, {name}. In the hands of mortals, objects like this often make slaves of those who hold them. I am pleased that you have avoided such a fate."
